scripts.svg: for i in output/outlines/*.dxf; do npx dxf-to-svg "$i"; done
scripts.3d: for i in output/cases/*.jscad; do npx @jscad/cli@1 "$i" -of stla; done
scripts.ps: npx ergogen . -o output && gci output/outlines -Filter *.dxf | % { npx dxf-to-svg $_.FullName } && gci output/cases -Filter *.jscad | % { npx @jscad/cli@1 $_.FullName -of stla }
